function-usage.testenviron: In order to try out the examples, start a command shell and move to folder $FOXPATH/examples-functions/name-multi-compare.

example.description: Check a set of documents for common/uncommon item names.
Restrict the report to names not occurring in all documents.
Restrict the report to details about the individual documents - the item names contained and not contained by all other documents.
Get a complete report in which documents are described by file names, rather than URIs.

function-usage.seealso: Related functions are path-multi-compare, name-compare, node-deep-equal and node-deep-similar.
